level.text: Each child-placing agency using volunteers to work directly with children on a regular basis shall:
Describe the duties for volunteer positions;
Require a personal reference for each volunteer and a criminal records and child abuse clearance;
Not use a volunteer to fill a staff position required by the child-placing agency’s service program plan;
Have a designated staff member to supervise and evaluate each volunteer;
Provide orientation and training for the volunteers in the philosophy of the agency, the needs of the children in care, and the needs of their families;
Maintain records documenting the hours and activities in which volunteers work for the agency; and
Require that volunteers rendering direct services to children be free of communicable and contagious diseases based upon medical reports completed within the previous twelve (12) month period.
